entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:37 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 11:38 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

Temperature: -34.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -38.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 33.
